verses.name: Esther 4:12
verses.text: And they told to Mordecai Esther’s words.

verses.name: Esther 4:13
verses.text: Then Mordecai commanded to answer Esther, Think not with thyself that thou shalt escape in the king’s house, more than all the Jews.

verses.name: Esther 4:14
verses.text: For if thou altogether holdest thy peace at this time, then shall there enlargement and deliverance arise to the Jews from another place; but thou and thy father’s house shall be destroyed: and who knoweth whether thou art come to the kingdom for such a time as this?

verses.name: Esther 4:15
verses.text: Then Esther bade them return Mordecai this answer,
